name: phonebook
description: A repository for the Phonebook exercise in part 3 of the Full Stack Open Course \ by The University of Helsinki \ Course can be found here https://fullstackopen.com/en/

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf dist && cd ../frontend && npm run build && cp -r dist ../backend
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push

author: Mussie Habtemichael
